item.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth – Fullland of Water and Light delayed to March 13
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/is-it-wrong-to-try-to-pick-up-girls-in-a-dungeon-familia-myth-fullland-of-water-and-light-delayed-to-march-13

  • PC
  • Switch

Release delayed by two weeks due to the anime's broadcast schedule.

Publisher Bushiroad Games and developer Racjin have delayed side-scrolling action RPG Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Familia Myth – Fullland of Water and Light from its previously planned February 27 release date by two weeks to March 13. It will be available for Switch and PC via Steam with English and Japanese language support.

Bushiroad Games said the delay is in response to the announcement of the broadcast schedule for the climax of the Is It Wrong to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? V anime. Since the game is set after the events of the anime season, Bushiroad Games delayed its release until after the final episode airs on March 6.

item.title: Gemdrops announces hololive Holo’s Hanafuda for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/gemdrops-announces-hololive-holos-hanafuda-for-pc

  • PC

Due out in 2025. Playable at Taipei Game Show 2025.

Gemdrops has announced hololive Holo’s Hanafuda, a hanafuda game with online support featuring hololive members. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2025 with English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, and Indonesian language support. It will also be playable at Taipei Game Show 2025, which will run from January 23 to 26 at Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center.

Here is an overview of the game, via Gemdrops:

About

hololive Holo’s Hanafuda is a modern take on the classic Japanese card game, hanafuda. In hololive Holo’s Hanafuda, you can battle it out with cards that feature original hololive member art!

In addition to hanafuda’s traditional rule systems—Koi-Koi, Oicho-Kabu, and Hana Awase—this game also features an original gameplay mode called “Holo Awase.” That makes for a total of four different playable rule sets with which you can battle your opponents both online and offline!

Holo Awase

Match cards with hololive characters on them to finish holo sets and unleash each character’s powerful unique skill! Get the most sets and the most points to beat your opponent!

Multiple Modes?!

Though matches form the bulk of this game, there is more than just hanafuda to this game! Adventure Mode, for instance, takes players on a wild story-based adventure with their hololive friends—with a healthy dose of hanafuda to boot, of course. Then there’s the cozy bento box mode, where you can make bento lunch boxes alongside hololive characters, too. All this and more awaits you in hololive Holo’s Hanafuda!

View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯

item.title: This Week’s Japanese Game Releases: ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist, Guilty Gear: Strive for Switch, more
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/this-weeks-japanese-game-releases-ender-magnolia-bloom-in-the-mist-guilty-gear-strive-for-switch-more

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Final Fantasy VII Rebirth for PC, NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD for PlayStation, etc.

ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC, and Guilty Gear: Strive for Switch are the highlights of this week’s Japanese video game releases.

Also due out this week are the PC version of Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, as well as the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions of NEEDY STRAMER OVERLOAD.

Get the full list of this week’s Japanese game releases below. It should be noted that Gematsu will receive a small percentage of money from purchases made through Play-Asia links. You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.

Hardware

  • DualSense Wireless Controller “Chroma Teal” (PS5)
    • North American Version (PS5)
    • European Version (PS5)
    • Asian Version (PS5)
  • PlayStation 5 Slim Console Cover (PS5)
    • North American Version (PS5)
    • European Version (PS5)
    • Asian Version (PS5)

Physical and Digital

  • ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist (PS5, PS4, Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (PS5, PS4, Switch)
      • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
  • Guilty Gear: Strive (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (Switch)
    • European Version (Switch)
  • Let’s School (Switch) – Already available worldwide.
  • Neon White (PS5, Switch) – Already available worldwide.
  • School Girlfriend 2 (PS4, Switch, PC)
    • Serika Hatsukoi Box (PS4, Switch)
    • Gachi Koi Box (PS4, Switch)
  • School Girlfriend / School Girlfriend 2 / School Girlfriend: Mayoigo Engage Set (PS4, Switch)
  • Sweet Cafe Collection (Switch)
    • Limited Edition (Switch)

Digital-Only

  • Achilles: Legends Untold (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • DISORDER (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • DOKAPON! Sword of Fury (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dreamcore (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • ENDER MAGNOLIA: Bloom in the Mist (Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Final Fantasy VII Rebirth (PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Mercenaries Lament: Requiem of the Silver Wolf (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Mika and the Witch’s Mountain (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD (PS5, PS4) – Launching worldwide.
  • NOROI KAGO: the Grudged Domain Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Ravenswatch (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • European Version (Switch)
  • Strania: The Stella Machina EX (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • The Tale of Bistun (PS5, PS4, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Tokyo Xtreme Racer Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.

The PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch titles listed above can be purchased through Japanese PlayStation Network and Nintendo accounts using prepaid cards:

  • PlayStation Store cards (yen): 1,100 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 10,000
  • Nintendo eShop cards (yen): 1,000 / 1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 9,000

item.title: Palworld Early Access celebrates first anniversary with updates roadmap and Pal popularity vote
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/palworld-early-access-celebrates-first-anniversary-with-updates-roadmap-and-pal-popularity-vote

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Cooperative cross-play, final boss / ending scenario, and more on the way.

Today marks the first anniversary of Palworld‘s Early Access launch on January 19, 2024, and developer Pocketpair is celebrating the occasion by revealing the open-world survival crafting monster collection game’s updates roadmap and launching a worldwide Pal popularity vote. The company has also published the game’s full official soundtrack to YouTube.

Get the details below.

Worldwide Pal Popularity Poll

We’ll be holding a popularity vote for the over factions. We invite all players and fans to take part. 180 Pals that have appeared so far, as well as the seven leaders of the enemy

  • Voting Site

Future Updates

We’ve been updating the game since the start of Early Access, and we’ll continue to update Palworld as we prepare for the official release!

The future roadmap includes the following:

  • Major Updates
    • Cooperative cross-play.
    • World transfers for Pals.
    • Final boss / ending scenario.
    • Further ways to strengthen and improve Pals.
    • Various new content such as new Pals and technologies.
    • Game collaborations (including Terraria).
  • Other Improvements
    • Improvements to world object placement.
    • Improvements to base Pals.
    • Improvements to optimization.
    • Improvements to user experience.

We look forward to your continued support for Palworld in its second year.

Soundtrack Released for Free!

The soundtrack is available for free on the Pocketpair official YouTube channel. Enjoy the music of Palworld, a mysterious world of adventure and action, and enjoy a unique video featuring over 50 different Pals!

Palworld is available now in Early Access for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store. It is also available via Game Pass.

item.title: Granblue Fantasy: Versus Rising DLC character Sandalphon launches February 26
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/granblue-fantasy-versus-rising-dlc-character-sandalphon-launches-february-26

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

Additional characters to launch in the spring, summer, fall, and early 2026.

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising downloadable content character Sandalphon will launch on February 26 for $7.99 as the first character of Character Pass 2, publisher Cygames and developer Arc System Works announced.

Additional Character Pass 2 characters are planned for release in spring 2025, summer 2025, fall 2025, and early 2026.

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC Character Sandalphon Gameplay Trailer

Japanese
